issue.title: Low frame rates on sensors with 1.8.6/2.6.5

content.raw:
I have (non-ROS) logs that show 40Hz lidar consistently during practice. For testing purposes we slowed down our cloud simulator during practice for diagnostics - that might be the missing piece.
The issue seems to be a function of the rate of simulation: when it goes above ~0.3 the sensors start dropping back of the defined rates.

We also added in use of the hand cameras recently - drawing more sensor data (i.e. twice as much).

40Hz lidar is essential for our approach.
content.html:
I have (non-ROS) logs that show 40Hz lidar consistently during practice. For testing purposes we slowed down our cloud simulator during practice for diagnostics - that might be the missing piece. The issue seems to be a function of the rate of simulation: when it goes above ~0.3 the sensors start dropping back of the defined rates.

We also added in use of the hand cameras recently - drawing more sensor data (i.e. twice as much).

40Hz lidar is essential for our approach.
